item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 1
item.description: Hyun Soo is a 29-year-old who quit a promising and well-paying job to become a screenwriter. However, things don't turn out as she expected. Hyun Soo is living with her younger sister, Hyun Yi, who earns more than what Hyun Soo makes. One day, Hyun Soo meets Jung Sun in a runners' club.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 2
item.description: Jung Sun runs around the Gyeongbok Palace area to look for Hyun Soo who got off the track. While trying to help Hyun Soo to run better, Jung Sun feels a sudden sparkle and asks her out. Hyun Soo thinks Jung Sun is being young and spontaneous. Meanwhile, Jung Sun's mother returns to Korea and hires a man to look for Jung Sun.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 3
item.description: Hyun Soo doesn't make the cut in the competition for her drama script. Jung Sun comforts her as she is upset. Through this, the two of them become closer. A package for Jung Sun gets sent to Hyun Soo's house, so she returns the package to him. Jung Sun prepares a delicious meal for her as a thank you.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 4
item.description: Hyun Soo and Jung Sun become closer, and the two of them decide to go on a trip together. They go to Beolgyo together and enjoy each other's company. Their feelings begin to develop into something more than friendship. However, upon their arrival to Seoul, they each face trials that they need to resolve.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 5
item.description: Hyun Soo meets Jung Sun's mother. Jung Woo finds out that Hyun Soo is out of a job and offers to employ her. Jung Sun decides to re-evaluate whether or not he should remain working at the restaurant. Meanwhile, Jung Sun and Hyun Soo's feelings towards each other continue to grow.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 6
item.description: Jung Sun invites Hyun Soo to try out some of his new menus. Using this as an excuse, the two spend more time together. Eun Sung calls Hyun Soo and asks her to return working for her. Meanwhile, Jung Sun's father comes to meet him to confront him about his mother’s return.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 7
item.description: Jung Sun leaves for Paris with his mom. Hyun Soo begins her job working under Jung Woo. She finds out that Jung Sun left without saying goodbye to her. While she continues on with her life, she is reminded of Jung Sun from time to time. Meanwhile, Jung Woo begins to develop feelings towards Hyun Soo and decides he's going to tell her.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 8
item.description: After bumping into each other, Hyun Soo finds out that they are both contracted under On Entertainment. Hyun Soo feels embarrassed that Jung Sun saw the fight that she had with the producer of her drama. She is stressed because she not only has trouble with her producer but also the main actor. Meanwhile, Jung Sun goes online to leave comments supporting her.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 9
item.description: Five years have passed, and Jung Sun and Hyun Soo meet again. Hyun Soo tells him that she regretted missing his call the day that he left. Won Joon finds out that Hong Ah is working as Hyun Soo’s assistant. He calls her to confront her for making Jung Sun and Won Joon believe that Hyun Soo was going to get married.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 10
item.description: Jung Sun is worried about the fact that the restaurant isn't doing as well as he expected. He decides that it's time for him to do other things in order to promote his restaurant. Hyun Soo goes to see him and talk things out. Jung Sun tells Hyun Soo that he intends to focus on his work.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 11
item.description: Hyun Soo and Yi Bok go head-to-head on the script of "Unruly Detectives". She calls Jung Sun, who misses her call. The two go on a run together to help ease Hyun Soo's stress over her drama. Meanwhile, Hong Ah meets Jung Woo. She gives him a copy of a script she had written.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 12
item.description: Hong Ah asks Hyun Soo to take her name off the list of assistant writers. She finally wins a contest for her script. Hyun Soo's drama doesn't do well again, and she prepares herself for becoming a scapegoat for the poor ratings. Meanwhile, Jung Sun gets ready to appear on a variety show.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 13
item.description: Jung Sun goes to Hyun Soo to comfort her. After Jung Sun cancelled on her, Hong Ah goes to Hyun Soo's house. Much to her surprise, Jung Sun opens the door to Hyun Soo's home. Meanwhile, Jung Woo goes to convince Ha Rim to return to the shoot, and Jung Sun confides in Hyun Soo over his restaurant.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 14
item.description: Kyung and Hyun Soo go to Good Soup for lunch. After lunch, Jung Sun invites her to his home. Hyun Soo confronts him about Hong Ah and his relationship. She tells him she doesn't want to fight with Hong Ah over a man. He tells her to give up on him if that is the case. Meanwhile, Hong Ah and Jung Woo meet to continue their conversation over the possibility of signing a contract.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 15
item.description: Hyun Soo decides to quit writing the script for "Unruly Detectives". She struggles with her decision as her future as a writer may be over. After Jung Sun's TV appearance, things are looking up for Good Soup. Jung Woo works hard to solve the problems that came from Hyun Soo quitting the drama. Meanwhile, Hong Ah spends more time with Won Joon.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 16
item.description: Kyung and Hyun Soo get ready to leave for a trip. Jung Sun comes to drive them. Joon Ha and Jung Woo also drive down to meet Kyung and Hyun Soo. Jung Sun and Hyun Soo enjoy a date in Yeosu. Meanwhile, Hong Ah meets with Hong Jin and bumps into Yi Bok. Yi Bok suggests that she join the writer team for "Unruly Detectives".
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 17
item.description: Jung Woo is torn after finding out that Hyun Soo and Jung Sun like each other. Upon their return to Seoul, Jung Woo suggests that Hyun Soo continue writing "Kind Soup Will Not Pick Up His Calls". Hyun Soo hesitates as it hasn't been long since she withdrew from "Unruly Detectives". Meanwhile, Good Soup is in trouble after a diner was served food that she was allergic to.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 18
item.description: After deciding to continue working on "Kind Soup Will Not Pick Up His Calls", she begins to do research for the script at Good Soup. Things are looking up for Hyun Soo as her relationship with Jung Sun is problem free, and she is preparing her next project. Meanwhile, Jung Woo decides that he won't give up on Hyun Soo yet and continues to plan his proposal.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 19
item.description: Hyun Soo begins to go to Good Soup to do research on her new project. Jung Sun focuses on his work despite the bad reviews he had received over the allergy incident. As the two spend more time together, their relationship continues to grow. Meanwhile, Jung Woo feels sad as he watches their relationship.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah

item.title: Temperature of Love - Episode 20
item.description: Jung Sun tells Jung Woo that he wants to introduce him to his girlfriend. Upon hearing this, Jung Woo tells him to bring her to the dinner where he intends to propose to Hyun Soo. Jung Sun agrees and calls Hyun Soo. Meanwhile, Jung Woo also calls Hyun Soo asking her to meet him.
item.actor: Seo Hyun Jin,Yang Se Jong,Kim Jae Wook,Jo Bo Ah
